description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Customer_Business_ConnectionObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Customer_Business_ConnectionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Customer_Business_ConnectionObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: The business connection owner can not be updated.
